entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
